alert.note: Alert for Peoria; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:11PM CDT until August 20 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR MARSHALL...NORTH CENTRAL WOODFORD AND NORTHEASTERN PEORIA COUNTIES... At 211 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lacon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Washburn around 215 PM CDT. Henry around 225 PM CDT. Varna around 230 PM CDT. Toluca around 235 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pattonsburg, La Rose, Lake Wildwood, Marshall-Putnam County Fairgrounds, Marshall County Airport and Hopewell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
